mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, DELETED FROM POPUP WHERE ID = #{popupId} AND DELETED = 0

SELECT P.ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, null, PN.CATEGORY, OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE FROM POPUP P JOIN PLAN PN ON P.PLAN_ID = PN.ID WHERE P.ID = #{popupId} AND P.DELETED = 0
SELECT ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, DELETED FROM POPUP WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId} AND DELETED = 0

SELECT P.ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, PI.URL AS thumbnail, PN.CATEGORY, OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE FROM POPUP P LEFT JOIN POPUP_IMAGE PI ON P.ID = PI.POPUP_ID JOIN PLAN PN ON P.PLAN_ID = PN.ID WHERE WITHDRAWAL_STATUS != #{withdrawalStatus} AND P.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY PULLED_DATE DESC

SELECT P.ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, PI.URL, PN.CATEGORY, OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE FROM POPUP P LEFT JOIN POPUP_IMAGE PI ON P.ID = PI.POPUP_ID JOIN PLAN PN ON P.PLAN_ID = PN.ID WHERE WITHDRAWAL_STATUS != #{withdrawalStatus} AND sysdate BETWEEN OPEN_DATE AND CLOSE_DATE AND P.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY PULLED_DATE DESC

SELECT P.ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, PULLED_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, PLAN_ID, PI.URL, PN.CATEGORY, OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE FROM POPUP P LEFT JOIN POPUP_IMAGE PI ON P.ID = PI.POPUP_ID JOIN PLAN PN ON P.PLAN_ID = PN.ID WHERE WITHDRAWAL_STATUS != #{withdrawalStatus} AND sysdate < OPEN_DATE AND P.DELETED = 0 ORDER BY PULLED_DATE DESC
